list_item.paragraph: Add support for Clang-Format by @agarny [#310].
CMake: address policy CMP0086 by @agarny [#308].
Add list of source code contributors as recorded by GitHub by @hsorby [#281].
Add the Component.takeVariableMethods() #214 by @TedAhmadi [#278].
Update the XmlNode and XmlAttribute type methods by @nickerso [#275].
Parsing should be done on fully qualified element names (#263) by @agarny [#264].
Various basic clean-ups by @agarny [#267].
Improve the configuration by @hsorby [#255].
Roadmap: replaced “CellML 1.2” with “CellML 2.0” by @agarny [#262].
Tests for resolving imports by @nickerso [#167].
Imports revisited by @hsorby [#248].
Upgraded gtest to version 1.8.0 by @agarny [#251].
Compilation error “catching polymorphic type … by value” (#246) by @agarny [#247].
Add Model::hasUnits(UnitsPtr) method by @nickerso [#235].
Windows: renamed the cellml.lib/cellml.dll files to libcellml.lib/libcellml.dll by @agarny [#243].
Make sure that PASCAL is not already defined by @agarny [#245].
Tests: treat warnings as errors (#239) by @agarny [#240].
Test CellML file: make sure we declare the CellML 2.0 namespace by @agarny [#241].
Configuration improvements by @hsorby [#230].
Validation by @hsorby [#227].
Update internal_utils.cmake by @hsorby [#229].
Add resets by @hsorby [#177].
BUGFIX: CMake 3.11 changed the directory lookup by @rblake-llnl [#231].
[bindings] Split Python tests into multiple functions. Closes #225 by @MichaelClerx [#226].
SWIG Interfaces, Python bindings and tests for the Python bindings by @MichaelClerx [#205].
Improve windows development setup documentation by @hsorby [#223].
Parser test: allow two different versions of an error message (#218) by @agarny [#219].
Removed Format enum. Closes #209 by @MichaelClerx [#210].
Added Model.replaceUnits(UnitsPtr, UnitsPtr) by @MichaelClerx [#201].
Add ComponentEntity.replaceComponent(c1, c2) method by @MichaelClerx [#199].
Added Component.removeVariable(size_t) method by @MichaelClerx [#200].
Rename the Import class to ImportSource by @agarny [#191].
adding test to illustrate #183 by @nickerso [#184].
Added an uninstall target (#181) by @agarny [#185].
Clear our error handler by @nickerso [#180].
Move test resource definitions into a common location by @hsorby [#173].
New test case with complex encapsulation hierarchy by @nickerso [#171].
Update documentation rough object images by @hsorby [#169].
Remove map_components element by @hsorby [#160].
Adding some tests on component counts with imports by @nickerso [#163].
Remove ability for Component class to hold Units by @hsorby [#159].
Remove offset from Units by @hsorby [#158].
Remove base_unit attribute from expected outputs by @hsorby [#152].
Add configuration files and implement export configuration by @hsorby [#146].
Printer by @hsorby [#144].
No exceptions by @hsorby [#143].
Remove methods that return const references to smart pointers by @hsorby [#141].
Tidy up header file includes to the correct order by @hsorby [#142].
Hide private by @hsorby [#137].
Resolve warning from Visual Studio about dll interface for std::string by @hsorby [#138].
Xml indentation by @hsorby [#135].
Clean up inefficient multiline methods by @hsorby [#136].
Change CellML version from 1.2 to 2.0 by @hsorby [#133].
Update copyright statement by @hsorby [#134].
Tidy up the codebase to meet our software standards by @hsorby [#132].
Add tests and implementation for ‘Validate’ (use-case 4) by @dladd [#127].
Change to using #pragma once for header guards by @hsorby [#131].
Rename generated header files. by @hsorby [#128].
Add tests and implementation for ‘Load` (use-cases step 3) by @dladd [#114].
Update object models for validate step by @dladd [#121].
Updated the link to the Google C++ style guide by @agarny [#119].
Update use-cases diagram with proposed load XML methods by @dladd [#113].
Implement clean-up items before ‘Load’ step by @dladd [#112].
Add tests and implementation for ‘Modify’ (use-case 2) by @dladd [#109].
Update use-cases object model to Modify step (2) by @dladd [#108].
Implement clean-up items before ‘Modify’ step by @dladd [#107].
Add documentation for the use of labels by @dladd [#106].
Changes to unit prefix handling by @dladd [#103].
Clean up the documentation (#92) by @agarny [#93].
Cleanup minor issues from math implementation pull by @dladd [#102].
Add tests and implementation for maths (use-case 1.xiii-xiv) by @dladd [#98].
Swap method/attribute names from ‘mathString’ to ‘math’ in object model by @dladd [#101].
Bugfix: remove extraneous text from Apache license by @dladd [#100].
Add maths use-cases to doc by @dladd [#96].
Add tests and implementation for connections (use-case 1.xii) by @dladd [#89].
Add connections to use-cases object model by @dladd [#85].
CMake files: some minor cleaning up (#83) by @agarny [#84].
Add funding acknowledgement by @dladd [#91].
Tests and implementation for variable interfaces by @dladd [#80].
Nicer target presentation for Visual Studio by @hsorby [#70].
Some further cleaning up by @agarny [#81].
The treatment of MathML in libCellML by @nickerso [#66].
Add interface use-cases to variable use-case item by @dladd [#78].
Code tidy-up by @dladd [#76].
Update use-cases object model with variable interfaces by @dladd [#79].
CMake: replaced obsolete use of add_compiler_export_flags() function (#72) by @agarny [#73].
Supporting variable initial values (part of use-cases 1.xi) by @dladd [#68].
Bugfix: enable variable serialisation in unnamed component by @dladd [#71].
Supporting use-case 1.xi (a-c): a model with variables by @dladd [#64].
Update use cases: add variable initial values and modify connections by @dladd [#67].
Proposed object model for use-cases 1.i-1.xi by @dladd [#62].
Re-order use-cases doc to modify models before loading by @dladd [#60].
Usecase 1.x by @hsorby [#58].
Add initial tests for Units, including skeleton Units class by @hsorby [#52].
Add corrections to object model as noted by @agarny by @hsorby [#55].
Add a short document on current thinking by @hsorby [#56].
Adjust use cases to match current thinking by @hsorby [#51].
Update Object model images by @hsorby [#50].
Add test for non-existent url by @hsorby [#47].
Change the usecases of imports to reflect the latest developments in … by @hsorby [#46].
starting to play around with options for component imports by @nickerso [#45].
Implementation for usecases upto 1vii smart by @hsorby [#42].
Implementation for usecases upto 1vii by @hsorby [#36].
Docs by @hsorby [#40].
New use cases for modification of model and component hierarchy by @nickerso [#34].
Prefer gcovr over gcovcoverage by @hsorby [#37].
Implementation for use cases upto 1.vi by @hsorby [#30].
Usecases 1ii 1iii by @hsorby [#26].
Proposed rough object model for use cases 1.i - 1.vi by @hsorby [#28].
Usecase 1i by @hsorby [#22].
Add rules around variable naming by @hsorby [#24].
Fix use case png file name to suit Sphinx pdf generation by @hsorby [#21].
Add initial documentation by @hsorby [#14].
Scope by @hsorby [#18].
Requirements check by @hsorby [#17].
Set default options for develop branch by @hsorby [#16].
Add basic object model documentation by @hsorby [#10].
Minor fixes by @hsorby [#8].
Adding initial code stub with tests by @hsorby [#6].
Adding a fused gtest-1.7.0. Also added a CMakeLists.txt file for use by.. by @hsorby [#5].
Adding README.rst and .gitignore by @hsorby [#4].
